D2 starts | D2 ends

D3 starts | D3 and Game ends

PRIVATE TOPICS:


Mafia | Neighborhood | Dead | Mod | Review

Deadlines

2 week days, 48 hour nights. 48 hours before prod, 24 hours before replacement.

Rules

Follow all site rules. Be nice to your fellow players. Don't break the game by artificial means. Vote using bold or vote tags. When the majority of the votes is on a person, he gets lynched. If you don't get a majority before the deadline, a no lynch occurs. Any private topics that are part of the game will be released unedited at endgame.

Public Info

Normal Game. Daytalk.
3 mafia
vs
10 town
. Mafia members can perform kill in addition to any role usage.

Spoiler: Sample VT Role PM
Vanilla Townie


Welcome
BlackVoid
, to Mini Normal 1897. You are a Vanilla Townie.

Abilities:
  • Your weapon is your vote, you have no night actions.
Win condition:
  • You win when all mafia have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.
Confirm through PM by replying with your Role and Alignment. Game thread is here.


Town Win condition:
You win when all mafia have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.

Mafia Win condition:
You win when you have at least one member alive and the Town have been eliminated or nothing can prevent this from occurring.

Day 1 Begins

I know BV's touched on it already but I think town had two major pitfalls this game, the first and most obvious being that they lynched D1/D2/D3 way too quickly and didn't give themselves time to actually think anything through or analyse players; it's favoured scum pretty heavily and it's not all that difficult to stop quicklynching so hopefully people don't continue doing so when moving forward. The second one is the activity level during the first 48 hours of D1 was way too high, there's a sweet spot between "Too little content to enough reads" and "Too much content that people can't catch up and read it all", the sweet spot most certainly was not hit during this D1; meant that it's exceedingly difficult for players to catch up on the game or reread it in hopes of getting a new perspective, I've noticed this is a problem sitewide throughout the last year or so (And has let to games having 700+ pages which is absurd) and an increased scum win rate is pretty noticeable alongside it, people need to really stop spamming and think through the game a little more.

Thought this was very well modded, lots of page top vote counts, always planned and ready to have the game run as smooth as possible. Rather disappointing that the setup didn't get fully played in that most of the power roles and elements to the game didn't actually come out largely due to the D1 lynch.
